articles.title: Trump issues 'last warning' to Hamas to release all remaining hostages

articles.title: House Speaker Mike Johnson’s chief of staff arrested for DUI after Trump speech, police say

articles.author: CBC.ca
articles.title: Trump administration has been talking with Hamas, marking U-turn from prior U.S. policy
articles.description: The United States broke a longstanding diplomatic taboo by holding secret talks with the militant Palestinian group Hamas on securing the release of U.S. hostages held in Gaza, sources told Reuters on Wednesday, while U.S. President Donald Trump warned of "hell to pay" should the Palestinian militant group not comply.
